about_the_game:
CellQuest is an educational game that aims to entertain and educate players in a captivating manner. The game provides a rich and immersive gameplay experience, delving into the intricate world of the cellular Mitogen-activated Protein Kinase (MAP-K) signaling process and the Trimeric G-protein cell signaling cycle.

In CellQuest, players embark on a fascinating journey into the depths of cellular biology. Taking control of a virtual cell, they navigate through a series of challenges and obstacles. The game offers a detailed and informative environment that accurately represents the complexities of cellular signaling pathways, providing players with a deeper understanding of these crucial biological processes.

As players progress through the game, they engage in strategic decision-making, experiment with different scenarios, and observe the outcomes. They encounter various molecules, enzymes, and proteins that play vital roles in the signaling pathways, learning how these components interact and communicate to regulate important cellular functions.

CellQuest presents an intuitive interface and user-friendly controls, ensuring that players of all ages and backgrounds can enjoy the educational adventure it offers. Whether you're a student seeking to enhance your knowledge of biology or simply someone interested in the intricacies of cellular signaling, CellQuest provides an immersive experience that combines entertainment and education.

Prepare yourself for an extraordinary quest to unravel the secrets of cellular biology. With CellQuest, you'll embark on a captivating adventure that expands your understanding of cellular signaling, all within a gameplay experience that engages and enlightens.

name: CellQuest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB RAM

short_description: CellQuest is designed to simulate the cellular Mitogen-activated Protein Kinase signaling process (MAP-K) and the Trimeric G-protein cell signaling cycle.
